name: SRIJAN FOUNDATION
briefDescription: The society is organizing various activities in rural areas. It has chosen children, women, youth and socially, economically backward persons as target groups to promote its programmes and achieve activities. Literacy programmes, health and environment awareness programmes such as AIDS, evils of use of tobacco, drug addiction, global warming, plantation, pollution control, use and benefit of  bio manures, polio programmes, TB, cancer, dowry, domestic violence, consumer awareness, computer training, training to women and physically handicap persons to make them economically independent are some of the programmes the society has been carried out from time to time.
